theater.name: CGV Sense City

theater.name: Kinh thành Huế
theater.description: World Cultural Heritage! Relive the old days of the Nguyen Dynasty. The past still has so much to be explored.

theater.name: Lăng Minh Mạng
theater.description: The tomb of Minh Mang. It was built from 1840 to 1843 by over ten thousand craftsmen and soldiers.

theater.name: Bảo tàng Hồ Chí Minh

theater.name: Bảo tàng Phụ nữ Việt Nam
